reviewText: Our 2 boys saw this on TV as kids and it took a quality of "legend" in our home as time went by. The dramatization of the deaths of Peter Reimer and Beryl Rutt are pretty unforgettable. So we had to buy this when it came on sale. Over all, this is educational, well done, not hokey, or gory. It is the story of the saltwater crocodile and it's fearsome  presence near Darwin Australia. There's a bit of science too.
